verses.verse: I exhort <WG3870> therefore, <WG3767> first <WG4412> of all, <WG3956> that <WG4160> petitions, <WG1162> prayers, <WG4335> intercessions, <WG1783> and givings of thanks, <WG2169> be made <WG4160> for <WG5228> all <WG3956> men: <WG444>

for <WG5228> kings <WG935> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> who are <WG5607> in <WG1722> high places; <WG5247> that <WG2443> we may lead <WG1236> a tranquil <WG2263> and <WG2532> quiet <WG2263> life <WG979> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> godliness <WG2150> and <WG2532> reverence. <WG4587>
For <WG1063> this <WG5124> is good <WG2570> and <WG2532> acceptable <WG587> in the sight of <WG1799> God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Savior; <WG4990>
who <WG3739> desires <WG2309> all <WG3956> people <WG444> to be saved <WG4982> and <WG2532> come <WG2064> to <WG1519> full knowledge <WG1922> of the truth. <WG225>
For <WG1063> there is one <WG1520> God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> one <WG1520> mediator <WG3316> between God <WG2316> and <WG2532> men, <WG444> the man <WG444> Christ <WG5547> Jesus, <WG2424>
who gave <WG1325> himself <WG1438> as a ransom <WG487> for <WG5228> all; <WG3956> the testimony <WG3142> in its own <WG2398> times; <WG2540>

to <WG1519> which <WG1519> I <WG1473> was appointed <WG5087> a preacher <WG2783> and <WG2532> an apostle <WG652> (I am telling <WG3004> the truth <WG225> in <WG1722> Christ, <WG5547> not <WG3756> lying <WG5574>), a teacher <WG1320> of the Gentiles <WG1484> in <WG1722> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> truth. <WG225>

I desire <WG1014> therefore <WG3767> that <WG4336> the men <WG435> in every <WG3956> place <WG5117> pray, <WG4336> lifting up <WG1869> holy <WG3741> hands <WG5495> without <WG5565> anger <WG3709> and <WG2532> doubting. <WG1261>

In the same way, <WG5615> that <WG2885> women <WG1135> also <WG2532> adorn <WG2885> themselves <WG1438> in <WG1722> decent <WG2887> clothing, <WG2689> with <WG3326> modesty <WG127> and <WG2532> propriety; <WG4997> not <WG3361> just with <WG1722> braided hair, <WG4117> <WG2228> gold, <WG5557> <WG2228> pearls, <WG3135> or <WG2228> expensive <WG4185> clothing; <WG2441>
but <WG235> (which <WG3739> becomes <WG4241> women <WG1135> professing <WG1861> godliness <WG2317>) with <WG1223> good <WG18> works. <WG2041>
Let <WG3129> a woman <WG1135> learn <WG3129> in <WG1722> quietness <WG2271> with <WG1722> all <WG3956> subjection. <WG5292>

But <WG1161> I don't <WG3756> permit <WG2010> a woman <WG1135> to teach, <WG1321> nor <WG3761> to exercise authority over <WG831> a man, <WG435> but <WG235> to be <WG1511> in <WG1722> quietness. <WG2271>
For <WG1063> Adam <WG76> was <WG4111> first <WG4413> formed, <WG4111> then <WG1534> Eve. <WG2096>
<WG2532> Adam <WG76> <WG538> wasn't <WG3756> deceived, <WG538> but <WG1161> the woman, <WG1135> being deceived, <WG538> has <WG1096> fallen into <WG1722> disobedience; <WG3847>

but <WG1161> she will be saved <WG4982> through <WG1223> her childbearing, <WG5042> if <WG1437> they continue <WG3306> in <WG1223> faith, <WG4102> <WG2532> love, <WG26> and <WG2532> sanctification <WG38> with <WG3326> sobriety. <WG4997>
